thread.title: NAPW Inducts Alissa Werre, Owner & Engineer at El Paso County/A.Werre Engineering (AWE), Into its VIP Professional Woman of the Year Circle
thread.title_full: NAPW Inducts Alissa Werre, Owner & Engineer at El Paso County/A.Werre Engineering (AWE), Into its VIP Professional Woman of the Year Circle - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: NAPW Inducts Alissa Werre, Owner & Engineer at El Paso County/A.Werre Engineering (AWE), Into its VIP Professional Woman of the Year Circle
text:
Alissa Werre selected for her outstanding leadership and commitment within her profession
Garden City, NY (PRWEB) September 22, 2015
The National Association of Professional Women (NAPW) honors Alissa M. Werre , P.E., as a 2015-2016 inductee into its VIP Woman of the Year Circle. She is recognized with this prestigious distinction for leadership in business. NAPW is the nation's leading networking organization exclusively for professional women, boasting more than 775,000 members and over 200 operating Local Chapters.
“I'm pleased to recognize Alissa with this important honor,” says NAPW President Star Jones. “Her perseverance, work ethic and leadership qualities are an inspiration to all women.”
Alissa Werre has been the Owner of A. Werre Engineering (AWE) since 2004. Her skills and areas of expertise include transportation engineering, contract management, residential foundation design and structural analysis. She is also a Transportation Design Engineer, Project Manager and Supervisor for the El Paso County Department of Transportation, a position she’s held for 14 years.
“AWE is a foundation and structural design company,” she said. Ms. Werre received her Bachelor of Science degree in Engineering from the University of Wyoming.
For her commitment to achieving success according to her personal standards of excellence, and for her outstanding accomplishments in enriching the field of finance with her diversified proficiencies, Ms. Werre is being honored as a leader and role model for her profession.
About NAPW
NAPW’s mission is to provide an exclusive, highly advanced networking forum to successful women executives, professionals and entrepreneurs where they can aspire, connect and achieve. Through innovative resources, unique tools and progressive benefits, professional women interact, exchange ideas, advance their knowledge and empower each other.
